Package com.cloudhopper.mc.runtime

package com.cloudhopper.mc.runtime
Defines the runtime interfaces used by cloud function implementations.

These types are implemented or consumed at function invocation time.

  • CloudRequestHandler - user-implemented function interface
  • HandlerContext - platform-provided runtime context
  • Schnittstellen
    Klasse
    Beschreibung
    CloudRequestHandler<I,O>
    A user-defined function handler for processing cloud function requests.
    HandlerContext
    Provides runtime information about the current function invocation.
